interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
Review Date: 2020/09/09
Store: PRETTY FRANK
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'PRETTY FRANK', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Scent': 'Jasmine, Coconut', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '3.42 x 2.79 x 2.59 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
Review Text: I like the fact that its organic and made in the US. However, this is not a deodorant for someone who is on the move. I do have sweaty underarms and I had to clean my armpits and apply this several times a day to be dry.  I don't like that I have to put this on with my fingers.  I was dry long as I wasn't moving around to much and in a cool place.  The jasmine scent is wonderful.  It is a small jar but you get a lot.
Review Title: Not for me
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.

Very pretty, they have a good stretch depending you your hairstyle you may twist twice.  You get two of each color.  The only thing I did not like is that these hair ties have a paint smell to them so wash them before wearing them.
Good
STYLEAGAL Portable Electric Nail Drill, Manicure Pedicure Drill Kit Professional nail starter kit for beginners acrylic with drill（2020 Upgraded）
styleagal
{'Brand': 'styleagal', 'Voltage': '5 Volts', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.8 x 4.5 x 2 inches; 8.01 Ounces', 'UPC': '782913461771', 'Manufacturer': 'STYLEAGAL'}
[[VIDEOID:c1d81e3cfad618ed65e971a49ab65264]] This is a nice drill great for beginners.  Just take some practice to get good at using it on your self and others hand.  The power cord is not long enough and the drill bits is hard to push them in and to pull out.  If you have never used a drill start working with the lower speed first.
Works very well
Pretty Frank Natural Deodorant Jar- No Aluminum Deodorant for Women, Men, Teens, & Kids – Paraben Sulfate Free Cream Deodorant with Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Vitamin E & Baking Soda (Jasmine)
PRETTY FRANK

I like the fact that its organic and made in the US. However, this is not a deodorant for someone who is on the move. I do have sweaty underarms and I had to clean my armpits and apply this several times a day to be dry.  I don't like that I have to put this on with my fingers.  I was dry long as I wasn't moving around to much and in a cool place.  The jasmine scent is wonderful.  It is a small jar but you get a lot.
Not for me
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: The user continues to show interest in hair accessories, particularly versatile and colorful hair ties, and beauty tools for personal care. A recent purchase of a natural deodorant indicates an expanding interest in organic personal care products.
- **Aesthetic Preferences**: The user values visual appeal, frequently describing products as "very pretty" and appreciating thoughtful design, including scents that enhance product experiences.
- **Functionality**: There is a clear priority on practicality, reflected in recent interactions where the user assesses how well products perform in everyday scenarios, such as cosmetic routines and personal care. 
- **Quality Assessment**: The user maintains a discerning evaluation approach, as seen in providing feedback based on personal experience. They expect products to meet high standards across categories.
- **Sensory Awareness**: The user is sensitive to product scents and usability. They express specific preferences for scents, as well as concerns about how products fit into an active lifestyle, indicating a desire for functionality that matches their needs.
- **Buying Habit**: Comprised of thoughtful purchases that emphasize a balance of aesthetics and functionality, the user values product details such as ease of use and application methods, especially in personal care items.

This updated profile highlights a user who appreciates well-designed, functional beauty and personal care products while being attentive to sensory aspects and overall usability.
